column4: bad idea.. yuk. If it doesn't work, all future xorg updates will end up with X not working and it's really painful tryint to remove the binary mess and go back to packages
not if he used the latest envy with dkms support
any reason not to just use nvidia-glx-new? It's the same driver, but packaged so it doesn't get broken every time other packages are updated
its not the same, its very old
-new means the new cards and a new driver version
new cards not new driver version*
